function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unprecedented lockdown leading to energy wastage in municipal buildings","Impact":"Increased energy consumption, potential for resource wastage","Mitigation":"Implement energy efficiency actions, monitor building performance","Technologies":"Energy management systems, building automation systems","People":"Municipal administration staff","Owner":"Municipal administration"},{"Description":"Data validity and generalizability in post-pandemic world","Impact":"Inaccurate conclusions, ineffective implementation of energy efficiency practices","Mitigation":"Ensure representative and generalizable data collection, compare pre-and post-pandemic scenarios","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, energy professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, energy management companies"}]}
